inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of a characterized depressive episode assessed by the clinician
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Introduction or switch of an antidepressant (without combination of molecules)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand the nature, purpose and methodology of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand and conduct clinical assessments.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: The following psychiatric comorbidities: Bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, alcohol dependence and / or any other substance objectivized during the clinical evaluation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient presenting a depressive episode characterized with mixed component, psychotic, melancholic or catatonic characteristics
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Score MADRS greater than or equal to 5 to one of the items
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject protected by law (guardianship or curatorship)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject not affiliated to, or not beneficiary of, a social security scheme
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease and experiences slowness of movement and tremors. He is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl, which help with shaking and slow movement.
